channel.title: Need a cut and destroy script! *EASY*
channel.description:
Just need a script that will cut a tree then click on "destroy" (instead of dropping them) in the inventory. Would be great help. Thanks
oh and btw: it doesn't need anti-randoms, just needs human cursor movement (:

item.title: Need a cut and destroy script! *EASY*
item.dc:creator: @mjordan mjordan
item.description:
@mjordan wrote:

How much xp do they give each?

Read full topic
item.source: Need a cut and destroy script! *EASY*

item.title: Need a cut and destroy script! *EASY*
item.dc:creator: @Rune_Hacker1 Rune Hacker
item.description:
@Rune_Hacker1 wrote:

just edit a pre-made woodcutting that drops logs into a script that chooses them to destroy them. If you want a custom script for your use only, thats the best way to go.

Read full topic
item.source: Need a cut and destroy script! *EASY*

item.title: Need a cut and destroy script! *EASY*
item.dc:creator: @Drone666 Drone666
item.description:
@Drone666 wrote:

[quote=“dudeofthed, post:5, topic:83921”][quote author=Drone666 link=topic=123300.msg1210038#msg1210038 date=1177442787]
On some quest trees the logs (branches) cannot be dropped, but have to be clicked on and select destroy.
[/quote]Those are for non-tradeable items only. Not for normal trees, yew, willow, magic. Or quest items.[/quote]

I know, but they still give xp. And you can fill your inventory with them in 6-7seconds without the tree ever running out.

Read full topic
item.source: Need a cut and destroy script! *EASY*

item.title: Need a cut and destroy script! *EASY*
item.dc:creator: @dudeofthed dudeofthed
item.description:
@dudeofthed wrote:

Rune Hacker:

Since when is there a destroy option on a log…

I would make you one if you tell me what “Destory” is. I have never even heard of it. How about a dropper?

Read full topic
